text.*:
SAMA
Full name South African Medical Association
Members 17 500
Affiliation COSATU
Key people

Acting-Chairman: Dr Mark Sonderup

President: Dr Mac Lukhele
Country South Africa
Website www.samedical.org

The South African Medical Association (SAMA) is a trade union for doctors in South Africa. It is affiliated with the Congress of South African Trade Unions.

External links[edit]

  • Website of the organisation.
